definition: (of a thief, smuggler etc) to be caught with stolen or illegal goods/to be caught red-handed
entirely/without exception/(literary) to be together/to be alike

sentences.english: The thief who is arrested with stolen property in his possession, for example, will rarely confess his guilt.
sentences.chinese: 人贓俱獲的盜賊被捕時，很少承認他的罪行。

sentences.english: Four bad guys were arrested and 42 lbs. of marijuana and 2 oz. of methamphetamine were seized.
sentences.chinese: 於是在調查的時候，四個壞傢伙就被人贓俱獲了。
